title: Helvetica Film at Silverdocs
content:
I just snagged a couple of tickets to “Helvetica” at this year’s Silverdocs, the big documentary film festival in Silver Spring, Maryland (suburban Washington DC). Helvetica could be the sleeper hit of the festival—they have already added several screenings “by popular demand”(the festival ends Sunday June 17). Tickets still available for the Saturday and Sunday showings...This is so exciting—I understand Director Gary Hustwit gives Typophile gets a credit! More at silverdocs.com.

author: kflynn
